materials.raw_text:
Barium carbonate (BaCO3): 480 g 
 Cadmium oxide (CdO): 39 g 
 Manganese oxide (MnO): 29 g 
 Silica (SiO2): 320 g 
 Distilled water: 50 g (for mixing)

preparation.raw_text:
1. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, add 480 g of barium carbonate. 
 2. Slowly add 39 g of cadmium oxide to the bowl while stirring. 
 3. Add 29 g of manganese oxide, continuing to stir to ensure even distribution. 
 4. Gradually incorporate 320 g of silica, making sure all powders are mixed thoroughly. 
 5. Add 50 g of distilled water to the mixture to create a paste, ensuring all dry ingredients are wet.
